item.content:encoded: Graphic: William Joel/Polygon | Source images: Western Digital/Seagate/Microsoft Some recommendations to add more storage for Xbox games Storage space inside our consoles is at an absolute premium these days. Even though the Xbox Series X ships with 1 TB of built-in storage (the Series S has just 512 GB, unless you buy the 1 TB carbon black version of the Series S), you may be amazed ‚Äî no, terrified ‚Äî by how quickly that space can get gobbled up by games, updates, apps, and saves. Game Pass me...

item.description: Image: MachineGames/Bethesda Softworks Indiana Jones comes out of hiding at new Xbox showcase Xbox Game Studios and Bethesda Softworks showed off what‚Äôs coming to Xbox and PC this year during a new ...
item.content:encoded: Image: MachineGames/Bethesda Softworks Indiana Jones comes out of hiding at new Xbox showcase Xbox Game Studios and Bethesda Softworks showed off what‚Äôs coming to Xbox and PC this year during a new Xbox Developer Direct on Wednesday. In addition to promised reveals around MachineGames‚Äô Indiana Jones game and Obsidian Entertainment‚Äôs Avowed, the Xbox team also brought a surprise or two. Here‚Äôs a roundup of the biggest news from the latest Xbox showcase, in case you can‚Äôt watch the event in full...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: William Joel/Polygon | Image sources: 8Bitdo; Sony; Microsoft; Nintendo A range of shapes, sizes, and features to fit your hands as well as your play style Finding the best controller for playing PC games is a more personal journey than it sounds. It‚Äôs got to be comfortable to use, with every button, stick, and trigger easily in reach. It‚Äôs also important that you‚Äôre getting the features you want. For example, those might include easy setup on PC, good battery life, multi-platform com...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: William Joel/Polygon | Source images: 8Bitdo/Logitech/Genki/Nintendo Here are our favorite controllers, dock alternatives, headsets, and more The Nintendo Switch and Switch OLED consoles come with everything that most people need to have a good time. But the experience of owning a Switch can improve ...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: Cameron Faulkner/Polygon | Source images: SteelSeries, Sony, Corsair Maximize your PS5‚Äôs potential with these recommendations A lot has changed about the PlayStation 5 since it was released in late 2020. For starters, it‚Äôs easy to buy one now (sometimes for less than its original retailer price), after many months when Sony couldn‚Äôt keep up with demand. But more importantly, there are now several great PS5 games to play on it, a more robust online subscription with game trials, and se...

item.title: Neopets community in delight and discord over the return of original pet art | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Neopets Pets with old Neopets art, known as UCs, will be accessible to all For years, Neopets has had a black-market pet problem. Neopets themselves aren‚Äôt just digital pets ‚Äî they‚Äôre also cu...
item.content:encoded: Image: Neopets Pets with old Neopets art, known as UCs, will be accessible to all For years, Neopets has had a black-market pet problem. Neopets themselves aren‚Äôt just digital pets ‚Äî they‚Äôre also currency. When the website, popularized in the 2000s, got a revamp in 2007, its creators unintentionally created a new market for rare goods. At that time, most of Neopets‚Äô pet art was updated to a new style that let players decorate their pets with clothes, props, and background art. But certain pets...

item.content:encoded: Image: Cameron Faulkner/Polygon | Source images: Meta, Valve, Sony Interactive Entertainment Step into other worlds with the best PC, PlayStation, and stand-alone headsets Picking a virtual reality headset is a bit like buying a console ‚Äî that is, one that you wear on your face. Similar as they seem, they‚Äôre different in ways that may matter to you. The major players in VR gaming ‚Äî it currently boils down to Sony, Valve, and Meta ‚Äî each boast some games and features that are exclusive to their...

item.content:encoded: Graphic: Alice Newcome-Beill/Polygon | Source images: 8Bitdo, Corsair, Baseus Elevate your gaming experience with our favorite accessories The Asus ROG Ally is one of the most powerful handheld PCs currently available. But unlike the Steam Deck, there isn‚Äôt as robust of an accessory ecosystem for buyers. This makes sense, considering the Asus handheld has been available for less than a year, and has a significantly higher price point than Valve‚Äôs handheld. However, there‚Äôs a silver lining. Breaking Down Quantum Computing: Implications for Data Science and AI | KDnuggets
item.description: This article has explored the impact of quantum computing on data science and AI. We will look at the fundamental concepts of quantum computing and the key terms that are used in the field. We will al...
item.content:encoded: This article has explored the impact of quantum computing on data science and AI. We will look at the fundamental concepts of quantum computing and the key terms that are used in the field. We will also cover the challenges that lie ahead for quantum computing and how they can be overcome.

AI systems capable of such diagnostic dialogues could increase availability, accessibility, quality and consistency of care by being useful conversational partners to clinicians and patients alike. But approximating clinicians‚Äô considerable expertise...

item.title: Can large language models identify and correct their mistakes? | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Gladys Tyen, Intern, Google Research LLMs are increasingly popular for reasoning tasks, such as multi-turn QA, task completion, code generation, or mathematics. Yet much like people, the...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Gladys Tyen, Intern, Google Research LLMs are increasingly popular for reasoning tasks, such as multi-turn QA, task completion, code generation, or mathematics. Yet much like people, they do not always solve problems correctly on the first try, especially on tasks for which they were not trained. Therefore, for such systems to be most useful, they should be able to 1) identify where their reasoning went wrong and 2) backtrack to find another solution. This has led to a surge in ...

item.title: Responsible AI at Google Research: User Experience Team | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Ay√ßa √áakmakli, UX Lead, Google Research, Responsible AI and Human Centered Technology Team Google‚Äôs Responsible AI User Experience (Responsible AI UX) team is a product-minded team embed...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Ay√ßa √áakmakli, UX Lead, Google Research, Responsible AI and Human Centered Technology Team Google‚Äôs Responsible AI User Experience (Responsible AI UX) team is a product-minded team embedded within Google Research. This unique positioning requires us to apply responsible AI development practices to our user-centered user experience (UX) design process. In this post, we describe the importance of UX design and responsible AI in product development, and share a few examples of how our...

item.title: A/B Testing: A Comprehensive Guide | KDnuggets
item.description: A/B testing is a method of comparing two versions of a web page, app, or other product to see which one performs better. This article covers the basics of A/B testing, how to design and run an effecti...
item.content:encoded: A/B testing is a method of comparing two versions of a web page, app, or other product to see which one performs better. This article covers the basics of A/B testing, how to design and run an effective experiment, and how to analyze and interpret the results.
